text: In applying and construing this uniform act, consideration must be given to the need to promote uniformity of the law with respect to its subject matter among states that enact it.
historical:

For history of Law 19-86, see notes under ยง 15-361.

Uniform Law:

title.text: Judgments and Executions; Fees and Costs. (Refs & Annos)
